default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Hi, I'm Macchiato, client manager at Eastside Bank. Would you like to try our program... ah, you're the Chief here? My apologies. I subconsciously spew these lines whenever I meet someone new. I will definitely cooperate with you.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Is this what you wanted? I see. I will satisfy you.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Get ready for an unprecedented feast for the senses.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I will give everyone to motivation to keep going.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: My hand is sore... but I'm very happy.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: What do I do, it's over... I'm going to die...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Feel the joy with your heart...

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I can't die... I still have to...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Chief, you're back? I put yesterday's work report on your desk already. Would you like something to drink? Coffee, tea or something else? I'll prepare it for you.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Physical pain is short-lived, but mental pleasure brings long-lasting satisfactionâ€”or so they say. Would you like to try it?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Eastside Bank's new wealth management program is superb! It's low-risk, high-return and boasts an annualized return of 12%. I joined it myself. Chief, are you really not going to consider it?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: It's good to have a nine-to-five job. This way, I'll have enough time to pursue my "hobbies".

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: When my younger siblings get jobs, I will truly be free. When that day comes, I want to become a truck driver in Sandsea, or a rock drummer in the Syndicate... as long as I can leave Eastside.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Life in Eastside is too depressing. Sales quotas, debts, stocks, emotions... Everyone has countless things to worry about. Maybe that's why they need me.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: This might sound a bit ungrateful, but I dislike the title "Dominatrix"... However, if it's what you desire, Chief, I'm willing to be your personal dominatrix.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: In the past, I somewhat resisted this power and identity. But ever since you showed up, I realized that satisfaction truly does exist... perhaps I'm addicted to you, dear Chief.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Welcome to Eastside Bank! Oh, I mean MBCC... sorry, I was dozing off just now.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: If you're really stressed, I can help you destress.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: I've never been a secretary before. What do I need to do? Is satisfying all of your needs enough?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I will complete this mission for sure.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Mission accomplished. Who do I find to write off the expenses?

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Thank you for your support.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: It might hurt a little. Is that fine?

beguiled_heart.title: Obtain Attire
beguiled_heart.text: Sure, if that's what you need, I'll raise the whip for you again... to satisfy the deepest desire within you.

beguiled_heart.title: Greeting
beguiled_heart.text: Do you want a reward from me too? That's all right, don't be shy... I will accept every side of you.

beguiled_heart.title: Ordinary Contact 1
beguiled_heart.text: Sure you can't go on? Hang in there a little longer. I promise to take you to heaven at just the right moment... Trust me... I know your limits quite well.

beguiled_heart.title: Ordinary Contact 2
beguiled_heart.text: Here, open your mouth. This is your reward for being obedient and cooperative... Let's enjoy it together.

beguiled_heart.title: Idle
beguiled_heart.text: Ah... Very nice, everyone is sated...

beguiled_heart.title: Special Attention
beguiled_heart.text: If you want it, just nod, and I'll show you... the sweetest reward.

beguiled_heart.title: Level Up
beguiled_heart.text: How about that? Do you feel light as a feather now?

beguiled_heart.title: Annoyed
beguiled_heart.text: Are you so eager? Then get into position, and don't move around...
